wiki.summary: Track: Boy With Luv (feat. Halsey), "작은 것들을 위한 시" (aka "A Poem for Small Things"); Boy With Luv (feat. Halsey) is a song by BTS featuring American singer Halsey. It was released on April 12, 2019, serves as the title track and appears as the second track in their sixth mini album 'Map of the Soul: Persona' and as the second track in their fourth studio album 'Map of the Soul: 7'. The song has been described as funk-pop, nu-disco and electro-pop with electrical hooks and live instruments. It also has an Japanese Version. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: Track: Boy With Luv (feat. Halsey), "작은 것들을 위한 시" (aka "A Poem for Small Things"); Boy With Luv (feat. Halsey) is a song by BTS featuring American singer Halsey. It was released on April 12, 2019, serves as the title track and appears as the second track in their sixth mini album 'Map of the Soul: Persona' and as the second track in their fourth studio album 'Map of the Soul: 7'. The song has been described as funk-pop, nu-disco and electro-pop with electrical hooks and live instruments. It also has an Japanese Version. The song has achieved a 12 Perfect All-Kill (PAK) on Korean charts and it has 21 Music Show Wins. The song also debuted at #8 on Billboard Hot 100; on June 20, 2019, the song had been certified Platinum by the RIAA, for selling 1 Million copies in the country (US). On April 13, 2019, "Boy With Luv (feat. Halsey)" garnered over 74.6 million views in it's first day, being in the sixth place overall. On Feb 08, 2023, the song surpassed 1 Billion Streams on Spotify, being the first Korean-language song to do so (BTS' third song to hit the milestone). BTS’ first anthology album “ Proof” Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
